column5: I was testing out the motors on the boat this morning and the Yamaha 30 hp two stroke stopped shifting! I won't shift into neutral or reverse!!! I removed the lower unit and it appears it's the shift rod that isn't moving so something happened in the lower unit. Without the lower unit on the upper half shifts fine. Can anyone recommend a re builder in the GTA area that works fast? Thanks
Good luck up there!  You make sure it's all in fine working order...

The marina I took it too told me at least ten days before they even look at it! Too late. I'm looking at a 25 Nissan four stroke tomorrow. Sucks to have to buy one but it's got trim and better gas mileage! I will post back how we do. Can't wait to get there!!
Yup, definitely not the place to second guess anything.  Have all your ducks in a row, she isn't very forgiving.

I grabbed a 97 Yamaha 30 long shaft commercial model today for a grand. Runs good and should do the trip. All greased up and checked over and a pile of parts off the other one along with tools packed and ready too go. I have a trolling motor on the front and three batteries and a set of oars! Should be good to go.

Should be good to go.   All I use. LOL  Have a good time.

There you go!!! Take Brian!!! That sounded like volunteering to me!   And I cook tooo. LOL
And I cook tooo. LOL  Geez now I want to go to. I've seen your foody pics!
Geez now I want to go to. I've seen your foody pics!  Here's one for ya. T'was yesterday's lunch. Applewood smoked bacon wrapped cream cheese poppers.
Here's one for ya. T'was yesterday's lunch. Applewood smoked bacon wrapped cream cheese poppers.    Lunch ? Snack LOL  Im all over that Dave
Mmmm bacon. No cheese please.   Mmmm, no cheese, guess your rowing solo. LOL  Have a great time Floater
Thanks guys looking forward to a new lake to fish and get lost on.
I'll take one order of the bacon wrapped cheese poppers with a side order of defibrillator!!  LOL Looks good Dave!!
He was praying for something to put in the frying pan!
